Netflix continues to adapt its content strategy to changing consumer preferences for digital entertainment.

Boeing's global supply chain and defense contracts provide resilience amid trade policy changes and geopolitical issues.
3M has a diversified product range and global operations, allowing it to manage supply chain disruptions effectively.
Procter & Gamble's extensive global supply chain and product diversification help mitigate risks from geopolitical tensions.
As a leading bank, JPMorgan Chase is sensitive to interest rate changes, benefiting from higher net interest margins as rates rise.
